TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit ListViewGroup extends System.Object implements class System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable
Public NotInheritable Class ListViewGroup Implements ISerializable

summary.span: 表示 控制項內所顯示的項目群組。

span.span: Represents a group of items displayed within a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 群組功能可讓您建立的邏輯相關的視覺化群組項目。The grouping feature lets you create visual groups of logically related items. 每個群組是由以文字為基礎的標題，後面接著一條水平線和指派給該群組的項目所組成。Each group consists of a text-based header followed by a horizontal line and the items assigned to that group. 您可以將 left、 right 或控制項的中央標頭文字的對齊。You can align the header text to the left, right, or center of the control. 指派給任何群組控制每次出現以外的其他屬性設定為值。Any groups assigned to a control appear whenever the property is set to a value other than . 群組可協助使用者尋找他們所尋找的項目分成有用的分類的項目。 groups help your users find the items they are looking for by separating the items into useful categories. 您可以建立您所需要的任何類別。You can create whatever categories you need. 排序一個項目分組的典型方式是附帶一提。One typical way to group the items is by the way they are sorted. 例如，您可以在初始時按字母順序排序的項目名稱的字母或子項目，例如類型或依序按一下 詳細資料檢視中的資料行標頭時排序清單的日期，分組項目。For example, you can group the items by the initial letter of the item name when they are sorted alphabetically, or by subitems such as type or date when the list is sorted by clicking a column header in the details view. Windows 檔案總管會使用這種類型的群組。Windows Explorer uses this type of grouping. 若要使用群組功能，新增一或多個物件至的集合控制項。To use the grouping feature, add one or more objects to the collection of a control. 在中設定的群組標頭文字和標頭對齊建構函式，或將它們設定使用和屬性。Set the group header text and header alignment in the constructor, or set them using the and properties. 您可以藉由指定中的群組項目將指派給群組建構函式，藉由設定屬性，或直接將加入的項目群組的集合。You can assign an item to a group by specifying the group in the constructor, by setting the property, or by directly adding the item to the collection of a group. 應該將所有項目指派給群組，才能讓它們顯示。All items should be assigned to groups before they are displayed. 不會指派給群組的任何項目會出現在預設群組中，具有標頭標籤"DefaultGroup{0}"。Any items that are not assigned to a group will appear in the default group, which has the header label "DefaultGroup{0}". 預設群組未包含在集合，而且不能更改。The default group is not contained in the collection, and cannot be altered. 它主要是用於偵錯，以確保所有項目有已正確新增至群組。It is primarily useful in debugging to ensure that all items have been properly added to groups. 項目只能是一個群組中一次。An item can only be in one group at a time. 您可以變更的群組的設定項目屬於屬性在執行階段，或將它加入至自動移除先前的群組中的另一個群組的集合。You can change the group to which an item belongs by setting the property at run time or by adding it to the collection of another group, which automatically removes it from the previous group. > [!NOTE] > 使用群組時，插入標記功能已停用。The insertion mark feature is disabled when using groups. 這是因為群組功能排序群組的成員資格的項目，而插入標記功能會使用具有拖放的重新定位控制項，已經不會排序其項目。This is because the grouping feature orders items by group membership, while the insertion mark feature is used with drag-and-drop repositioning in a control that does not already order its items. > [!NOTE] > 當您的應用程式呼叫時，群組是僅適用於 Windows XP 和 Windows Server 2003 系列方法。 groups are available only on Windows XP and the Windows Server 2003 family when your application calls the method. 在舊版的作業系統，與群組相關的任何程式碼將會被忽略，並不會出現群組。On earlier operating systems, any code relating to groups will be ignored and the groups will not appear. 如此一來，取決於群組功能的任何程式碼可能無法正確運作。As a result, any code that depends on the grouping feature might not work correctly. 您可能想要包含的測試，決定是否可以使用，「 群組 」 功能，並提供替代功能，無法使用時。You might want to include a test that determines whether the grouping feature is available, and provide alternate functionality when it is unavailable. 例如，您可以提供替代的排序時不支援依群組排序的作業系統上執行。For example, you might want to provide alternate sorting when running on operating systems that do not support sorting by group. > > 插入標記功能會提供相同的程式庫，提供作業系統的佈景主題功能。The insertion mark feature is provided by the same library that provides the operating system themes feature. 若要檢查此程式庫的可用性，請呼叫方法多載，並傳入值。To check for the availability of this library, call the method overload and pass in the value. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用來組織項目詳細資料檢視中的子項目值的分組功能。The following code example demonstrates how to use the grouping feature to organize items by subitem value in the details view. 這種形式是群組的類似於 Windows 檔案總管中所使用的群組。This form of grouping is similar to the grouping used in Windows Explorer. 在範例中，會以動態方式建立的群組。In the example, the groups are created dynamically. 每一個子項目的資料行中，一個群組會針對每個唯一子項目的值。For each subitem column, one group is created for each unique subitem value. 父項目資料行中，建立一個群組的每個唯一的首字母。For the parent item column, one group is created for each unique initial letter. 按一下資料行標頭的項目排序到建立該資料行的群組。Clicking the header of a column sorts the items into the groups created for that column. 再次按一下相同的資料行標頭會回復群組的順序。Clicking the same column header again reverses the order of the groups. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups/CPP/listviewgroupsexample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups/CS/listviewgroupsexample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups/VB/listviewgroupsexample.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何`ListViewGroup`可以將組織的應用程式中使用建構函式詳細資料檢視中的子項目值的項目。The following code example demonstrates how the `ListViewGroup` constructor can be used in an application that organizes items by subitem value in the details view. 這種形式是群組的類似於 Windows 檔案總管中所使用的群組。This form of grouping is similar to the grouping used in Windows Explorer. 在範例中，會以動態方式建立的群組。In the example, the groups are created dynamically. 每一個子項目的資料行中，一個群組會針對每個唯一子項目的值。For each subitem column, one group is created for each unique subitem value. 父項目資料行中，建立一個群組的每個唯一的首字母。For the parent item column, one group is created for each unique initial letter. 針對每個資料行建立的群組會儲存在雜湊表，以及首字母的子項目文字。The groups created for each column are stored in a hash table along with the subitem text or initial letter. 按一下資料行標頭時，此文字值用來比對到適當的資料行群組的項目。When a column header is clicked, this text value is used to match items to groups for the appropriate column. 完整的範例，請參閱概觀參考主題。For the complete example, see the overview reference topic. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups/CPP/listviewgroupsexample.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups/CS/listviewgroupsexample.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups/VB/listviewgroupsexample.vb#3)]

summary.span: 取得或設定群組的頁首文字。

span.span: Gets or sets the header text for the group.

value.span: 要顯示的群組頁首文字。

span.span: The text to display for the group header.
The default is "ListViewGroup".

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要擷取的標頭文字，或在執行階段變更的標頭值，請使用這個屬性。Use this property to retrieve the header text or to change the header value at run time. 您也可以設定的標頭文字建構函式。You can also set the header text in the constructor.

span.span: Gets or sets the alignment of the group header text.

value.span: 其中一個 值，指定頁首文字的對齊方式。

span.span: One of the values that specifies the alignment of the header text.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個屬性，以取得行首對齊方式，或變更在執行階段的對齊方式。Use this property to retrieve the header alignment or to change the alignment at run time. 您也可以設定的標頭對齊建構函式。You can also set the header alignment in the constructor.

exception.span: 設定這個屬性時所指定的值不是有效的 值。

span.span: The specified value when setting this property is not a valid value.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Items As ListView.ListViewItemCollection

summary.span: 取得集合，這個集合包含與這個群組相關聯的所有項目。

span.span: Gets a collection containing all items associated with this group.
A that contains all the items in the group.

value.span: 如果群組中沒有項目，則會傳回空的 物件。

span.span: If there are no items in the group, an empty object is returned.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以藉由指定中的群組項目將指派給群組建構函式，藉由設定屬性，或直接將加入的項目群組的集合。You can assign an item to a group by specifying the group in the constructor, by setting the property, or by directly adding the item to the collection of a group. 應該將所有項目指派給群組，才能讓它們顯示。All items should be assigned to groups before they are displayed. 不會指派給群組的任何項目會出現在預設群組中，具有標頭標籤"DefaultGroup{0}"。Any items that are not assigned to a group will appear in the default group, which has the header label "DefaultGroup{0}". 預設群組未包含在集合，而且不能更改。The default group is not contained in the collection, and cannot be altered. 它主要是用於偵錯，以確保所有項目有已正確新增至群組。It is primarily useful in debugging to ensure that all items have been properly added to groups. 項目只能是一個群組中一次。An item can only be in one group at a time. 您可以變更的群組的設定項目屬於屬性在執行階段，或將它加入至自動移除先前的群組中的另一個群組的集合。You can change the group to which an item belongs by setting the property at run time or by adding it to the collection of another group, which automatically removes it from the previous group. > [!NOTE] > 項目可以是內出現集合的群組，但如果也沒有內出現的集合控制項本身，它不會出現在控制項中。An item can be present within the collection of a group, but if it is not also present within the collection of the control itself, it will not appear in the control.
